content: I'm glad you mentioned the importance of designating a special storage area for family heirlooms. I was really shaken when I realized I had misplaced my grandmother's antique locket - it was given to me before she passed away, and it holds a lot of sentimental value. I was searching every room, every drawer, and every box for it, but it wasn't until I was cleaning out my dresser 4 days later that I found it nestled between two old t-shirts. It was such a relief!
